Bash(SILICONFLOW_API_KEY="" python3 -c "
from siliconflow_tts import SiliconFlowTTS
import asyncio

async def test_without_key():
    tts = SiliconFlowTTS()
    print(''API密钥状态:'', tts.validate_api_key())
    
    # 测试文本处理逻辑
    result = await tts.text_to_speech(''测试文本'', ''中文女'')
    print(''调用结果:'', result[''success''])
    if not result[''success'']:
        print(''错误信息:'', result[''error''][:50])

asyncio.run(test_without_key())
")

import asyncio
from siliconflow_tts import SiliconFlowTTS

async def test_tts():
    tts = SiliconFlowTTS(''sk-wubypvpiulffcyilourqxgbideordblirkoceywfjdowbfji'')
    result = await tts.text_to_speech(''你好，这是音质测试'', ''中文女'')
    
    if result[''success'']:
        print(''✅ TTS测试成功!'')
        print(f''音频大小: {result[""audio_size""]} bytes'')
        print(f''格式: {result[""format""]}'')
        print(f''采样率: {result[""sample_rate""]}'')
        return True
    else:
        print(f''❌ TTS测试失败: {result[""error""]}'')
        return False

asyncio.run(test_tts())
")
